Text:
Viruses are not the only dangerous programs on your computer. Spyware is just as important a nuisance, a threat that not all traditional antivirus products are able to cope. 
SUPERAntiSpyware detects and removes all types of spyware, adware from Trojans and dialers and cookies to suspect. Scans memory, registry and drives you choose in search of malware. 
Analyses of SuperAntiSpyware are fast and reliable. The items you want to consider a second time are stored in quarantine, while others will be deleted without delay. 
-Language: English
Thanks for your work in English translation partner paulspain
